title: Ex-Officer in Colorado Pleads Guilty to Assaulting Woman With Dementia - The New York Times
content:
1. Ex-Officer in Colorado Pleads Guilty to Assaulting Woman With Dementia  The New York Times
  2. Former Colo. Police Officer Austin Hopp Pleads Guilty to Assaulting Elderly Woman with Dementia  PEOPLE
  3. Former Loveland officer pleads guilty to assault related to Karen Garner's arrest  9NEWS
  4. Former Loveland police officer pleads guilty to assaulting dementia patient Karen Garner  Colorado Public Radio
  5. Former Loveland Police Officer Austin Hopp Reaches Plea Agreement  CBS Denver
description: Austin Hopp pleaded guilty on Wednesday to second-degree assault strangulation in the case of Karen Garner, whom he pinned down during an arrest on suspicion of shoplifting from a Walmart.
